# Modulverlauf





```{r source-timetable, echo = FALSE, cache=FALSE}
timetable_file <- "Interna/Modulverlauf.xlsx"
stopifnot(file.exists(timetable_file))
timetable <- readxl::read_xlsx(timetable_file)

gt::gt(timetable) |> 
  gt::cols_width(
    1 ~ gt::pct(5),
    2 ~ gt::pct(20),
    3 ~ gt::pct(20),
    4 ~ gt::pct(45)
  )
```
